name: Droid Rush (Zaksley, Zankanotachi, clemence_clv)
description:
DroidRush

A puzzle game where you must escape with your partner!

Avoid the enemies to reach the end TOGETHER

Use the items to your advantage (Whistle and invisibility hat)

Controls

WASD : Move

F : Pickup item

E : Use item

R : Drop Item

A : Possess drone (Player 1)

Credits

  • Clavel Clémence
  • Ferra Laurianna
  • Girard Jean-Félix
  • Lapointe Ann-Laurie
  • Lou Lori
  • McRea Patrick
  • Medina Enzo
